name: Dr. Asha Mehta
about: Dr. Asha Mehta is a renowned cardiologist with over 15 years of experience in treating heart conditions. She specializes in preventive cardiology and cardiac rehabilitation.

name: Dr. Rohit Verma
about: Dr. Rohit Verma is an expert dermatologist specializing in skin disorders, cosmetic dermatology, and dermatosurgery. He has helped thousands of patients achieve healthy skin.

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
about: Dr. Priya Sharma is a dedicated pediatrician who provides comprehensive healthcare for children from infancy through adolescence. She is known for her gentle approach with young patients.

name: Dr. Arjun Singh
about: Dr. Arjun Singh is a skilled orthopedic surgeon specializing in joint replacement, sports injuries, and trauma surgery. He has performed over 2000 successful surgeries.

name: Dr. Kavya Reddy
about: Dr. Kavya Reddy is an experienced gynecologist providing comprehensive women's healthcare including prenatal care, family planning, and gynecological surgeries.
